mapper.sql: item_id, shop_id, cat_id, brand_id, shop_cat_id, title, sub_title, bn, price, cost_price, mkt_price, weight, image_default_id, store, freez, order_sort, modified_time, has_discount, is_virtual, is_timing, violation, is_selfshop, nospec, sub_stock, outer_id, is_offline, barcode, disabled, use_platform, is_score, score, reward_score, check_status, supply_type, isbreak, isdirect, through_reason, point, is_show_weight
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysitem_item WHERE item_id=#{item_id}

SELECT sysitem_item.item_id,sysitem_item.title,sysitem_item.price, sysitem_item.point,sysitem_item.image_default_id,sysitem_item.shop_cat_id, sysitem_item_status.list_time, sysitem_item_count.sold_quantity + sysitem_item_count.vitural_quantity quantity FROM sysitem_item,sysitem_item_count,sysitem_item_status
order by ${sortBy} ${column} limit #{limitBegin},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into sysitem_item (item_id, shop_id, cat_id, brand_id, shop_cat_id, title, sub_title, bn, price, cost_price, mkt_price, weight, image_default_id, store, freez, order_sort, modified_time, has_discount, is_virtual, is_timing, violation, is_selfshop, nospec, sub_stock, outer_id, is_offline, barcode, disabled, use_platform, is_score, score, reward_score, check_status, supply_type, isbreak, isdirect, through_reason, point, is_show_weight, list_image, spec_desc, props_name, params ) values (#{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopCatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mktPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{imageDefaultId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{store,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{freez,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hasDiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isVirtual,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isTiming,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{violation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSelfshop,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nospec,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOffline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usePlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rewardScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isbreak,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isdirect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{throughReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isShowWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{listImage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{specDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{propsName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update sysitem_item
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shop_cat_id = #{shopCatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sub_title = #{subTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bn = #{bn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mkt_price = #{mktPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
image_default_id = #{imageDefaultId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store = #{store,jdbcType=INTEGER},
freez = #{freez,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_sort = #{orderSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
has_discount = #{hasDiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_virtual = #{isVirtual,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_timing = #{isTiming,jdbcType=INTEGER},
violation = #{violation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_selfshop = #{isSelfshop,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nospec = #{nospec,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sub_stock = #{subStock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
outer_id = #{outerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_offline = #{isOffline,jdbcType=INTEGER},
barcode = #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
use_platform = #{usePlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_score = #{isScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
reward_score = #{rewardScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
check_status = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_type = #{supplyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isbreak = #{isbreak,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isdirect = #{isdirect,jdbcType=INTEGER},
through_reason = #{throughReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
point = #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_show_weight = #{isShowWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
list_image = #{listImage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
spec_desc = #{specDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
props_name = #{propsName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
params = #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
